name: Sheep vs Fox DX
overview: Baaaaah! Those foxes are at it again, but this time in a deluxe version of Sheep VS Fox. This game was originally released on the Sheepoid DX and Woolly Jumper disk by Psytronik Software, but Alf and Richard are very happy to bring you this funny sequel, which consists of plenty of funny gags, sheep, new obstacles and even some countryside music.
